item.title: 巴西历史性洪灾为卢拉总统任期创造了 "卡特里娜时刻
item.description: 周日，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）飞越了淹没巴西南部地区的洪水，他看到的不仅仅是造成至少 100 人死亡、16 万人流离失所的灾难，更是他总统任期内的决定性时刻。【原文：When Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva flew over the floods that have submerged the southern part of his country on Sunday, he surveyed not just the devastation that has left at least 100 people dead and 160,000 displaced but a defining moment for his presidency.】

item.title: 印度国家银行在贷款收入增长的情况下实现利润增长
item.description: 由于贷款收入持续强劲，印度国家银行的季度利润超过了预期。【原文：State Bank of India’s quarterly profits surpassed estimates as lending income continues to be strong.】

item.title: 香港新房销售额达 54 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 由于政府取消了对房地产的限制，买家纷纷涌入市场，香港 4 月份的新房销售量飙升至历史新高。【原文：New home sales in Hong Kong surged to a record high in April, as buyers rushed to the market after the government removed property curbs.】

item.title: 特斯拉在华加大裁员力度，因销售放缓受到影响
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司在中国的裁员行动正在升级，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）面临着越来越大的压力，要在全球最大的汽车市场赢回份额。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s job cuts are escalating in China, according to people familiar with the matter, as Elon Musk contends with growing pressure to win back share in the world’s biggest auto market.】

item.title: 印度中央银行酝酿变革，可再生能源成本或将增加
item.description: 据一家顶级咨询公司称，印度央行关于项目融资的建议可能会使可再生能源项目的借贷成本增加多达 1 个百分点，从而可能导致该国风能和太阳能发电价格上涨。【原文：The Indian central bank’s proposals on project financing may add as much as 1 percentage point to the borrowing costs of renewables projects, according to a top consultancy firm, potentially causing a hike in wind and solar power prices in the country.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行上调影响政策的通胀预期
item.description: 土耳其中央银行上调了年底的通胀预期，这一出人意料的举动凸显了该行在将物价增长从目前近 70% 的水平上放缓方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised its year-end inflation forecast, a surprise move that underscores the challenge it faces in slowing price growth from its current level of almost 70%.】

item.title: 休-亨德利警告全球外汇疲软将引发 "疯狂的麦克斯 "通货紧缩
item.description:
"酸性资本家 "在想什么？【原文：

What’s on the mind of the “Acid Capitalist”?

】

item.title: 休-亨德利谈 "可怕的 "日元走势和通货紧缩风险
item.description:
"酸资本家 "说是时候恐慌了。【原文：

The Acid Capitalist says it's time to panic.

】

item.title: 中国考虑对通过互联互通购买的港股免征股息税
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国正在考虑对个人投资者通过 "股票通 "购买港股免征股息税的建议。【原文：China is considering a proposal to exempt individual investors from paying dividend taxes on Hong Kong stocks bought via Stock Connect, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 英国央行公布财报前，欧洲股市维持在纪录高位附近
item.description: 在英国央行做出政策决定之前，投资者对最新一批企业财报进行了评估，欧洲股市在纪录高点附近徘徊。【原文：European stocks hovered near record highs, as investors assessed the latest batch of corporate earnings reports ahead of the Bank of England’s policy decision.】

item.title: 德意志银行 DBIP 任命 Dhruva Agarwal 为印度负责人
item.description: 德意志银行去年成立的投资管理公司 DB Investment Partners Inc. 已任命 Dhruva Agarwal 为印度负责人，负责开拓印度快速增长的私人信贷市场。【原文：DB Investment Partners Inc., an investment manager launched by Deutsche Bank AG last year, has appointed Dhruva Agarwal as head of India to tap the fast-growing private credit market in the country.】

item.title: 马来西亚在低通胀和林吉特措施下维持关键利率不变
item.description: 马来西亚周四维持基准利率不变，在通胀风险迫在眉睫的情况下为日后保留政策弹药，并继续采取措施捍卫林吉特。【原文：Malaysia kept its benchmark interest unchanged on Thursday, saving its policy ammunition for later amid looming risks to inflation and ongoing measures to defend the ringgit.】

item.title: 土耳其废除强制银行购买里拉计价债券的规定
item.description: 土耳其中央银行结束了另一项旨在支撑里拉的规定，该规定近年来招致了银行家和投资者的批评。【原文：Turkey’s central bank has ended another rule designed to prop up the lira and which drew criticism from bankers and investors in recent years.】

item.title: Segantii 在被指控内幕交易前扩大四月份涨幅
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在香港当局上周指控这家亚洲对冲基金涉嫌内幕交易后，Segantii Capital Management Ltd. 首次向投资者提供了最新业绩报告。【原文：Segantii Capital Management Ltd. gave investors its first performance update after authorities in Hong Kong last week charged the Asian hedge fund with insider trading, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南咖啡带需要更多雨水来浇灌干旱的种植园
item.description: 即使在天气好转导致全球咖啡价格暴跌之后，顶级罗布斯塔咖啡生产国越南仍需要更多降雨。【原文：Much more rain is needed in top robusta coffee producer Vietnam even after improved weather spurred a slump in global prices.】

item.title: 拉扎德聘用退休银行家米歇尔-科洛奇推进医疗保健业务
item.description: 拉扎德公司聘请了前摩根士丹利交易员米歇尔-科洛奇（Michele Colocci）领导其欧洲医疗保健业务的拓展。【原文：Lazard Inc. has hired former Morgan Stanley dealmaker Michele Colocci to spearhead its European health-care expansion.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚亏损导致 Safaricom 年度利润低于预期
item.description: Safaricom Group Plc 公布的年度利润低于预期，原因是这家肯尼亚电信巨头在邻国埃塞俄比亚的业务部门在其运营的第一个完整年度出现了亏损。【原文：Safaricom Group Plc reported lower than expected annual profit as the Kenyan telecommunications giant’s unit in neighboring Ethiopia booked losses in its first full year of operations.】

item.title: 连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜交易首日上涨 11
item.description: 高端连锁超市 Spinneys 在迪拜首次公开发行股票，涨幅高达 11%。【原文：High-end supermarket chain Spinneys rose as much as 11% in its Dubai trading debut after a rare private sector initial public offering in the United Arab Emirates, an encouraging sign for other companies looking to go public.】

item.title: 首尔将于下周公布房地产债务措施
item.description: 韩国金融监督机构负责人表示，韩国计划下周宣布针对问题项目融资债务的措施，以缓解银行和房地产企业的压力。【原文：South Korea plans to announce measures for troubled project-finance debt next week in an effort to ease the stress in banking and real-estate businesses, according to the nation’s financial watchdog chief.】

item.title: 英国央行决议和新闻发布会：今日市场特刊
item.description: 通勤者经过伦敦金融城的英格兰银行（BOE）。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters pass the Bank of England (BOE) in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 外币紧缩缓解，埃及通胀持续放缓
item.description: 埃及的通货膨胀率在 4 月份连续第二个月放缓，因为在最近的货币浮动之后，外汇供应量的增加似乎缓解了中东人口最多国家的一些物价压力。【原文：Egyptian inflation slowed in April for a second month, as greater availability of foreign exchange after a recent currency flotation appeared to ease some price pressures for the Middle East’s largest population.】

item.title: 印度航空快运公司员工因合并起义，旅行混乱加剧
item.description: 印度航空有限公司（Air India Ltd. ）旗下的廉价航空公司在机舱乘务员集体请病假后，又取消了二十多个航班，并预计航班中断将持续数天。【原文：Air India Ltd.’s low-cost airline has canceled more than two dozen additional flights, and expects disruptions to continue for days, after cabin crew called in sick en masse.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 泰国经济学家支持 BOT 独立，降息呼声日益高涨
item.description: 在政府和商界领袖呼吁降低借贷成本以支持经济增长之后，一批泰国经济学家支持中央银行独立制定货币政策。【原文：A group of Thai economists backed the central bank’s independence in setting monetary policy after government and business leaders ratcheted up calls for lower borrowing costs to support economic growth.】

item.title: KKR 支持的修船公司将利用首次公开募股募集资金促进增长
item.description: 在完成韩国两年来最大的首次公开募股仅一天后，KKR & Co.支持的航运维修公司HD Hyundai Marine Solution Co.透露了其下一个目标— 未来三年年收入增长25%，并增加投资以解决海上排放问题。【原文：Only a day after completing South Korea’s biggest initial public offering in two years, KKR & Co.-backed shipping repair company HD Hyundai Marine Solution Co. has revealed its next goals — 25% growth in annual revenue for the next three years and increased investments to tackle maritime emissions.】

item.title: 沙特证券交易所首席执行官预计 IPO 将进一步激增
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯有十多家公司等待在其证券交易所进行首次公开募股，同时有多达 50 多家公司申请上市，这表明沙特王国的首次公开募股活动热潮将持续下去。【原文：Saudi Arabia has more than ten companies waiting to pursue initial public offerings on its stock exchange, while upwards of 50 firms have applied for listings, in a sign that the frenzy of IPO activity in the kingdom is set to continue.】

item.title: 上田岸田会谈助推日本央行快速行动，提高收益率
item.description: 日本首相和央行行长之间的会晤助长了人们的猜测，他们正在厘清政策变化，债券收益率也因此有望突破关键水平。【原文：Meetings between Japan’s prime minister and central bank governor are fueling speculation they’re ironing out policy changes, and bond yields look headed above a key level as a result.】

item.title: 墨西哥考虑吸收 Pemex 400 亿美元债务的方案
item.description: 墨西哥一位高级财政官员在纽约告诉投资者，墨西哥正在研究各种方案，以消化 Pemex 公司高达 400 亿美元的债务，这相当于下一届总统任期内即将到期的债务。【原文：Mexico is studying options to absorb as much as $40 billion in Pemex debt, the equivalent of what will come due in the next presidential term, one of its top finance officials told investors in New York.】

item.title: 曼哈顿四月公寓租金攀升至历史最高点
item.description: 曼哈顿的公寓租金上个月创下了 4 月份的新高，这一涨幅预示着即将到来的夏天将再创新高。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents rose last month to a new high for April, an increase that suggests another record-shattering summer to come.】

item.title: 没有美元的美国式借贷：欢迎来到比利时
item.description:
布鲁塞尔的政治僵局可能会在 6 月份的选举之后持续下去。【原文：

Political stasis in Brussels is likely to persist after elections in June.

】
